metadata.synopsis: The player approaches an area with a lot of tents & camp fires. It's the army of the Aboslute. The character comments that it's better to keep a safe distance from them.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Clustered fires and tents - the Absolute's army is camped here. Better not press my luck.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Clustered fires and tents. An army has gathered - best keep my distance.
